descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Get closer to the **Premier League** like never before with Premier League Player, the first-ever officially licensed VR Football (Soccer) game.

**Featuring all 20 Premier League teams**, authentic stadiums, and official kits.
[media]

# Moments
Step into the action with **Moments mode**, where you can replay highlights from the 2023/24 season. Become a hero for the club you support by scoring game-winning goals, delivering pinpoint assists, and feeling the intensity of every moment as if you were on the field.
[media]

# Shot Stopper
As the last line of defence, test your reflexes as a Premier League goalkeeper in our **Shot Stopper mode**.
[media]

# Headers
Rise above the competition in our **Heading mode**, perfecting the art of accuracy and timing. Jump in solo or with friends in head-to-head or coop mode.
[media]

# Free Play
Experience **Freeplay mode**, solo or with friends in local party mode, and sharpen your abilities with tailored Training Drills.
[media]

# The Sanctuary
Explore the **Player Sanctuary** to unlock and organise players, make the space your own, and then show off with your friends. Collect achievements and celebrate your journey to becoming a **Premier League Player**.
[media]

[media]

# Moments
Step into the action with **Moments mode**, where you can replay highlights from the 2023/24 season. Become a hero for the club you support by scoring game-winning goals, delivering pinpoint assists, and feeling the intensity of every moment as if you were on the field.

As the last line of defence, test your reflexes as a Premier League goalkeeper in our **Shot Stopper mode**.

# Free Play
Experience **Freeplay mode**, solo or with friends in local party mode, and sharpen your abilities with tailored Training Drills.

# The Sanctuary
Explore the **Player Sanctuary** to unlock and organise players, make the space your own, and then show off with your friends. Collect achievements and celebrate your journey to becoming a **Premier League Player**.
